issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
When selecting the 'Text field' option from 'Controls' within KitchenSink-v2 the application crashes when building to iOS 9 and 10 (Sim in this instance).

*Test Steps*
# Download KitchenSink-v2 (https://github.com/appcelerator/kitchensink-v2)
# Run the app 
# Go to "Text Field" when the app launches

*Expected result*
Application should not crash and and Text field options should be shown.

*Actual result*
Application crashes.
fields.summary: [iOS] When selecting 'Text Field' on Kitchensink-v2 the application crashes when using iOS 9 and 10
